question_text:
Question 41 
 
  
 
 
 
[Data Structure (Array)]
An array 


82,101,90,11,111,75,33,131,44,93
  is heapified.  Which one of the following options represents
the first three elements in the heapified array ? 
 
(A) 82, 90, 101 
(B) 82, 11, 93 
 
(C) 131, 111, 90 
(D) 131, 111, 90 
Ans. 
(D) 
Sol.
131
82
82
131
101
90
111
101
93
82
131
111
11
75
33
11
82
131
44
93

Final array [131, 111, 90, 101, 93, 75, 33, 11, 44, 82]

PAGE
34

Hence, the correct option is (D).
